Firmware update

固件升级

You are going to upload new firmware to the device.
Choose a proper file from your local hard drive and click "Update firmware" button.
Please, do not power off the device during update, if everything goes well, the device will restart.

将你的新固件上传到设备。
从本地硬盘驱动器中选择适当的文件，然后单击"升级固件" 按钮.
请不要在更新期间关闭设备电源，如果一切顺利的话，该设备将重新启动。

WARNINGS 警告！！！
  • do not power off the device during update
  • if everything goes well, the device will restart
  • you can upload whatever you want, so be sure that you choose proper firmware for your device
  • update ART   update uboot
  • 更新期间请勿关闭设备电源
  • 如果一切顺利，设备将重新启动
  • 你可以上传任何你想要的东西，所以一定要为你的设备选择合适的固件
  • 升级ART   升级uboot
